## EntityModelAnimation.stop() method

Stops the entity model animation, does nothing if already stopped.

\*\*Side effects:\*\* Emits `EntityModelAnimationEvent.STOP` when spawned.

\*\*Category:\*\* Entities

**Signature:**

```typescript
stop(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void
